target.description: Contains the Transport schema to connect to the remote target

remote-transport.description: The name of the transport being used

compiler.description: Contains additional information to compile the catalog

environment.description: The name of the environment for which to compile the catalog.

enforce_environment.description: Whether to force agents to run in the same environment in which their assigned applications are defined. (This key is required to be false if `environment` is an empty string).

transaction_uuid.description: The id for tracking the catalog compilation and report submission.

job_id.description: The id of the orchestrator job that triggered this run.
